newsitem.title: USA: Central Reserve Life to suspend dividend.
newsitem.headline: Central Reserve Life to suspend dividend.

text.p: Central Reserve Life Corp said on Friday it suspended its quarterly dividend to preserve capital as the company works to improve its financial results.

Central reported a fourth-quarter loss of $0.37 per share, compared to a profit of $0.20 per share for the same period a year ago. But the company said its losses have narrowed over the past three quarters, and credited the rate-adjustment strategy it adopted last April as part of its plan to return to profitability.
The company said its return to standard renewal practices and its continuing efforts to increase enrollment were intended to further improve its financial results.
